aboutWork: A cutting-edge VR project for automotive designers, inspired by Tilt Brush, enabling immersive car design with Oculus and stylus support. Includes a self-created introductory video and deep research into VR and industry tools.

Discover a UAE-based platform on Google Playstore and Apple Store, connecting enthusiasts to buy, sell, and indulge in dream vehicles. With seamless selling and user-friendly interface, elevate your automotive passion today.

Conducted a comprehensive UX challenge on Domino's app, featuring detailed case study integrating heuristic evaluation, card sorting, and PET analysis. Simplified user-centric approach enhancing app usability and overall customer experience.

A UI/UX application for managing solid waste, addressing the principles of manage, reduce, reuse, and recycle. Simplifies waste management with intuitive features, promoting eco-friendly practices for a sustainable future.

A project focused on designing and evaluating a health-related application using user-centered design principles. The application aims to reduce sedentary behavior and increase physical activity, promoting a healthier lifestyle through industry and academia-standard techniques.

workName: Course Comparison page for Warwick Business School
aboutWork: A course comparison page was designed for Warwick Business School, incorporating user personas, journeys, and responsive wireframes. The project emphasized user empathy and simplicity, with interactive prototypes aligned with WBS branding.
